forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 11C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High 51F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 8C. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower is possible early. Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower is possible early. Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 51F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 50F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
